description:
**Fix Overview**:

To protect against the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-26163), updating the browser to the latest version is crucial:

1. Open Microsoft Edge.
2. Go to Settings > Help and feedback > About Microsoft Edge to automatically download and install the latest updates.
3. Restart your browser after the update is completed to ensure all new features and security updates are active.

**Details**:
- Ensure Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) is updated to version 122.0.2365.92 or higher.
- For manual installation, you can download the update package from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB26163.
- It is recommended to regularly check for updates to maintain security against potential vulnerabilities.

**Preconditions**:
- Users should have administrative privileges to install updates.
- Backup any important data before proceeding with updates, just to be safe.
